Package com.ibm.streams.management.resource

Interface ExternalResourceManagerMXBean

public interface ExternalResourceManagerMXBean
ExternalResourceManagerMXBean provides attributes and operations for managing the currently configured Streams external resource manager.

ObjectNameBuilder.resourceManager(String, String) can be used with a managerType equal to the value of the EXTERNAL_RESOURCE_MANAGER domain property to build the ObjectName for an ExternalResourceManagerMXBean.

  • Method Details

    • getDomain

      String getDomain()
      Returns the unique identifier for the domain for which resources are being managed.
      Returns:
      the domain identifier.

    • getResources

      Set<String> getResources()
      Returns the set of resources allocated by the external resource manager.
      Returns:
      the external resources.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
      SecurityException - if the current user does not have the required permissions to perform the operation. Information about Streams permissions can be found in the product documentation. See topic: Security objects for Teracloud Streams domains and instances.

    • getType

      String getType()
      Returns the resource manager type.
      Returns:
      the resource manager type.

    • customCommand

      String customCommand(String command)
      Runs a custom resource manager command. The supported commands, as well as their input and output formats, are specific to each external resource manager. See the external resource manager documentation for additional information.
      Parameters:
      command - identifies the custom command to run. The format of the value is defined by the external resource manager
      Returns:
      an HTTPS URI to access the command results in text/plain format. This URI is valid for a single access for up to two minutes.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the operation is unable to complete successfully.
